text: Nujum Pak Belalang (English: The Fortune-telling of Pak Belalang) is a 1959 black-and-white comedy film from Singapore. Directed by and starring P. Ramlee, it is a fairytale based on a Malay folk tale. ==Related pages== * P. Ramlee filmography ==Other websites== * * Nujum Pak Belalang / 1959 - Filem Malaysia
title: Nujum Pak Belalang
